channel.title: How to extract a file bigger than 4 gigs?
channel.description: Hi, I have downloaded a compressed file with the internal file being about 4.5 gigs. I was wondering if there is a way to extract it without switching to NTFS. Or If I must switch, is it reversible and will it affect my computer at all? Thanks Justis

item.title: How to extract a file bigger than 4 gigs?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hi, I have downloaded a compressed file with the internal file being about 4.5 gigs. I was wondering if there is a way to extract it without switching to NTFS. Or If I must switch, is it reversible and will it affect my computer at all?
Thanks
Justis
